issue.title: [CI] [Rust] Travis CI builds fail with latest Rust 1.34.0-nightly (2019-02-25)
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4680](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4680). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
There's an unstable feature that's now marked for stabilisation in 1.34, and as a result Travis builds are failing. This is affecting all PRs that have been created or updated from 26 Feb 2019.

AppVeyor only emits warnings.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4680?focusedCommentId=16777617) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Issue resolved by pull request 3756
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/3756>
